name: You, Me and a Frog
description:
A co-op game where you and your partner Help the frog reach the stars (well, safely)

Controls:

  • Gamepad (Left stick, right stick)
  • Keyboard (Arrows, WASD)

Made during #EIGF game jam - 2022 , theme: Co-op

"Android Sock Hop" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
